directions: In a punch bowl, combine Mosel, cognac and Grand Marnier. Add a block of ice or ice cubes. Stir until very cold, then stir in seltzer. Garnish the punch withstrawberries.
ingredients: 2 bottles chilled Mosel (a medium dry German white wine)
2 cups chilled seltzer or club soda
1 pint strawberries, hulled (and quartered if large)
title: Strawberry Mosel Cup
